The advantage of overcoming the eight th: The distressing and feverish defilements that might arise in someone who lives without overcoming these eight things do not arise when they have overcome them.
This is the advantage that a mendicant gains by overcoming these eight things.
The training that a mendicant should fol: Whenever we encounter it, we will overcome gain
Whenever we encounter it, we will overcome loss
Whenever we encounter it, we will overcome fame
Whenever we encounter it, we will overcome disgrace
Whenever we encounter it, we will overcome honor
Whenever we encounter it, we will overcome dishonor
Whenever we encounter it, we will overcome wicked desires
Whenever we encounter it, we will overcome bad friendship.
